meet-us-description-first-paragraph: Since 2001, the core of our business has been selling new and used ambulances. The experience gained in this industry allows us to provide efficient and comprehensive customer service. We are able to fulfill any order for the delivery of new medical equipment and ambulances.
meet-us-description-second-paragraph: We also specialize in importing ambulances and medical motorcycles as well as special vehicles such as blood collection buses. We equip ambulances according to customer requirements. We ensure professional and friendly service.
experience-description: Since 2001, our activity has focused on selling medical equipment and ambulances.
professionalism-description: All our projects are executed at the highest level.
responsibility-description: With our acquired experience, you can confidently entrust us with your order.
diversity-description: We offer a wide range of ambulances - from light A2 ambulances to fully equipped Type C intensive care units.
rental-description: Our offer includes A2, B, and C type ambulances.
sale-description: The current ambulance offer is available on Otomoto. We also buy used and damaged ambulances.
rental-intro: Our offer includes A2, B, and C type ambulances.
sale-intro:
The current ambulance offer is available on Otomoto.
We also buy used and damaged ambulances.
